data.reasoning: Original summary 'Root' is too generic and doesn't describe the action. Description lacks context about the API's purpose and when this endpoint should be used. Improved version clarifies the endpoint's role in API discovery and provides better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'groundhogs' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description needs enhancement to explain the 2 available parameters (filtering/pagination), clarify the response structure, and reference the Groundhog schema for AI agent understanding of returned data.

data.current_description: Returns all prognosticating animals with their known predictions.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all prognosticating animals (groundhogs) in the database along with their known annual predictions. Supports filtering and pagination via query parameters. Returns an array of Groundhog objects, each containing up to 18 properties including prediction history.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description needs enhancement to explain the 2 available parameters (filtering/pagination), clarify the response structure, and reference the Groundhog schema for AI agent understanding of returned data.

message: Operation 'groundhog' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the slug parameter requirement, the response structure, and error handling. Enhanced version specifies the path parameter, response schema details, and error conditions for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Returns a prognosticating animal and its known predictions.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific prognosticating animal by its unique slug identifier along with all of its known annual predictions. Returns a single Groundhog object containing up to 18 properties including prediction history. Returns 404 if the slug does not match any known prognosticating animal.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the slug parameter requirement, the response structure, and error handling. Enhanced version specifies the path parameter, response schema details, and error conditions for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'predictions' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate but description is too brief. Missing details about the required year parameter, the response structure (array of Prediction objects with 4 properties each), and what prediction values represent. Enhanced version clarifies inputs and outputs for AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Get predictions for a given year
data.current_description: Get all predictions for a given year.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all annual predictions made by prognosticating animals for a specified year. Requires a year parameter. Returns an array of Prediction objects, each containing the animal's prediction (early spring or longer winter), prediction date, and related metadata.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description is too brief. Missing details about the required year parameter, the response structure (array of Prediction objects with 4 properties each), and what prediction values represent. Enhanced version clarifies inputs and outputs for AI agent interpretability.
